description: Light, soft, brushed cotton is the main ingredient of this flannel shirt. This much-loved model has been around with regular fit for a few seasons and is now available in comfort fit – for those who prefer a looser, more relaxed style. Its timeless design with button-down collar and one open chest pocket is perfect for casual workdays, evenings with friends and easy-going outdoor life
name: Fjallraven Ovik Comfort Flannel Shirt - Mens
